doc:
Robert Dalban https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Dalban 0 Robert Dalban (born Gaston Barré; 19 July 1903 in Celles-sur-Belle, Deux-Sèvres – 3 April 1987 in Paris) was a French actor. His work included stage acting, roles in TV shows and dubbing American stars. Moreover, he was a fixture in French cinema for many decades. Robert_Dalban ( born Gaston_Barré ; 19_July_1903 in Celles-sur-Belle , Deux-Sèvres – 3_April_1987 in Paris ) was a_French_actor . His_work included stage_acting , roles in TV_shows and dubbing American_stars . Moreover , he was a_fixture in French_cinema for many_decades .
